game.title: ⚔️ Typing Game
game.placeholder: Enter word of enemy and hit Space…
game.hint: Enter enemy word + Space → sword (near) or shuriken (far).

description.title: Game Description
paragraphs: This is a fast-paced typing and reaction game. You control a hero standing at the center of the arena, defending against waves of enemies coming from every direction.

Your main task is to quickly type the words above enemies' heads to throw shurikens at them, or, when they are close, to strike them with your sword. Earn combo points to unleash powerful attacks or restore your health.
The enemies grow faster and more dangerous with every wave — stay alert!

rules.title: Game Rules
items: The player is in the center of the field; enemies attack from all directions.
To throw a shuriken — type the word above the enemy's head in the input field.
If the enemy is too close, typing will trigger a sword attack instead.
If an enemy reaches the player — the player loses 1 life.
Word "combo" — destroys all enemies around. Cost: {combo} combo points.
Word "heal" — restores 1 life. Cost: {heal} combo points.
